blocks.name: basvtxval
blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an extensible structure with the set of vertices as base set. (Contributed by AV, 14-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm basvtxval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstr, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cfv(cvtx, c0), c1, cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  syl(w0, wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c0, cstr, c2))
  structn0fun(c0, c2)
  funvtxdmge2val(c0)
  opelstrbas(c1, c0, c2, c3, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm basvtxval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Struct]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → <(Base ` ndx), c1 > ∈ c0)
} = {
  eqtr4d((Vtx ` c0), c1, (Base ` c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (Vtx ` c0)=(Base ` c0), Fun((c0 \ { ∅ })), 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  syl(w0, Fun((c0 \ { ∅ })), c0[Struct]c2)
  structn0fun(c0, c2)
  funvtxdmge2val(c0)
  opelstrbas(c1, c0, c2, c3, w0)
}

blocks.name: edgfiedgval
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of a graph represented as an extensible structure with the indexed edges in the slot for edge functions. (Contributed by AV, 14-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)

  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c1), c0))
} = {
  eqtr4d(cfv(ciedg, c0), c1, cfv(cedgf, c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cfv(cedgf, c0)), wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  syl(w0, wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))), wbr(c0, cstr, c2))
  structn0fun(c0, c2)
  funiedgdmge2val(c0)
  strfv2d(c1, cedgf, c0, universe, c3, w0)
  edgfid()
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cstr, c2))
  structex(c0, c2)
  syl(w0, wfun(ccnv(ccnv(c0))), wbr(c0, cstr, c2))
  structfung(c0, c2)

blocks.name: structvtxvallem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ structvtxval and ~ structiedg0val . (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.) (Revised by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm structvtxvallem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c4))))
  -| wcel(c5, cn)
  -| wbr(cfv(cbs, cnx), clt, c5)
  -| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)))
} = {
  hashdmpropge2(c4, cfv(cbs, cnx), universe, c5, cn, c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  fvexd(cbs, cnx, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c5, cn))
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, universe))
  eqeltri(c4, universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)))
  prex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(cfv(cbs, cnx), c5))
  ltneii(cfv(cbs, cnx), c5)
  nnrei(cfv(cbs, cnx))
  basendxnn()
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wss(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)), c4))
  eqimss2i(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)), c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm structvtxvallem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→ 2[≤](# ` dom(c4)))
  ⊣ c5 ∈ ℕ
  ⊣ (Base ` ndx)[<]c5
  ⊣ c4 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c5, c2 > }
} = {
  hashdmpropge2(c4, (Base ` ndx), universe, c5, cn, c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  fvexd(cbs, cnx, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c5 ∈ ℕ)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltri(c4, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c5, c2 > })
  prex(<(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c5, c2 >)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (Base ` ndx)≠ c5)
  ltneii((Base ` ndx), c5)
  nnrei((Base ` ndx))
  basendxnn()
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c5, c2 > } ⊆ c4)
  eqimss2i({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c5, c2 > }, c4)
}

blocks.name: structvtxval
blocks.content: The set of vertices of an extensible structure with a base set and another slot. (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm structvtxval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cvtx, c4), c0))
  -| wcel(c5, cn)
  -| wbr(cfv(cbs, cnx), clt, c5)
  -| wceq(c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)))
} = {
  basvtxval(c4, c0, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c5), c1, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c4, cstr, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c5)))
  2strstr1(c4, c5, c0, c2)
  structvtxvallem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), c4))
  eleqtrri(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), c4, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2)))
  prid1(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c5, c2))
  opex(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0)
}

blocks.name: structiedg0val
blocks.content: The set of indexed edges of an extensible structure with a base set and another slot not being the slot for edge functions is empty. (Contributed by AV, 23-Sep-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm structiedg0val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c5), emptycls))
  -| wcel(c4, cn)
  -| wbr(cfv(cbs, cnx), clt, c4)
  -| wceq(c5, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2)))
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(ciedg, c5), emptycls, cfv(cedgf, c5), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c5), cfv(cedgf, c5)))
  mpan(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c5), cfv(cedgf, c5)), wbr(c5, cstr, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)))
  2strstr1(c5, c4, c0, c2)
  syl2an(wbr(c5, cstr, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(ciedg, c5), cfv(cedgf, c5)), wfun(cdif(c5, csn(emptycls))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c5))))
  structn0fun(c5, cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4))
  structvtxvallem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  funiedgdmge2val(c5)
  syl5eq(cfv(cedgf, c5), emptycls, cfv(c5, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))))
  mp2b(wceq(cfv(cedgf, c5), cfv(c5, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wceq(c5, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))), wcel(c5, universe))
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2)), wceq(c5, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))))
  a1i(wceq(c5, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))), wcel(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2)), universe))
  prex(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))
  edgfndxid(c5, universe)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wceq(cfv(c5, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), emptycls), wn(wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cdm(c5))))
  neleqtrrd(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cdm(c5), cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))))
  sylnibr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wcel(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)), wo(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4)))
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wn(wo(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4))), wn(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))), wn(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4)))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))), wn(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))))
  nesymi(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), wn(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4)))
  sylnibr(wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4), wceq(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx)))
  neneq(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
  eqcom(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4)
  ioran(wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx)), wceq(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4))
  elpr(cfv(cedgf, cnx), cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)
  fvex(cedgf, cnx)
  syl5eq(cdm(c5), cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4), cdm(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx))))
  dmeqi(c5, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c4, cfv(cedgf, cnx)), wceq(cdm(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c0), cop(c4, c2))), cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)))
  dmpropg(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cbs, cnx), c4)
  ndmfv(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm structiedg0val(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx))→(iEdg ` c5)= ∅)
  ⊣ c4 ∈ ℕ
  ⊣ (Base ` ndx)[<]c4
  ⊣ c5 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > }
} = {
  eqtrd((iEdg ` c5), emptycls, (.ef ` c5), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)))
  3adant3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx), (iEdg ` c5)=(.ef ` c5))
  mpan((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (iEdg ` c5)=(.ef ` c5), c5[Struct]<(Base ` ndx), c4 >)
  2strstr1(c5, c4, c0, c2)
  syl2an(c5[Struct]<(Base ` ndx), c4 >, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (iEdg ` c5)=(.ef ` c5), Fun((c5 \ { ∅ })), 2[≤](# ` dom(c5)))
  structn0fun(c5, <(Base ` ndx), c4 >)
  structvtxvallem(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  funiedgdmge2val(c5)
  syl5eq((.ef ` c5), emptycls, (c5 `(.ef ` ndx)), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)))
  mp2b((.ef ` c5)=(c5 `(.ef ` ndx)), c5 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > }, c5 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eqel(c5, universe, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > }, c5 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > })
  a1i(c5 = { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > }, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > } ∈ 𝕌)
  prex(<(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 >)
  edgfndxid(c5, universe)
  syl((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)), (c5 `(.ef ` ndx))= ∅, ¬(.ef ` ndx)∈ dom(c5))
  neleqtrrd((.ef ` ndx), dom(c5), {(Base ` ndx), c4 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)))
  sylnibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)), (.ef ` ndx)∈ {(Base ` ndx), c4 }, ((.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx)∨(.ef ` ndx)= c4))
  sylanbrc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)), ¬((.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx)∨(.ef ` ndx)= c4), ¬(.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx), ¬(.ef ` ndx)= c4)
  a1i((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)), ¬(.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx))
  nesymi((.ef ` ndx), (Base ` ndx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx), ¬(.ef ` ndx)= c4)
  sylnibr(c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx), (.ef ` ndx)= c4, c4 =(.ef ` ndx))
  neneq(c4, (.ef ` ndx))
  eqcom((.ef ` ndx), c4)
  ioran((.ef ` ndx)=(Base ` ndx), (.ef ` ndx)= c4)
  elpr((.ef ` ndx), (Base ` ndx), c4)
  fvex(cedgf, cnx)
  syl5eq(dom(c5), {(Base ` ndx), c4 }, dom({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > }), (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx)))
  dmeqi(c5, { <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > })
  3adant3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ≠(.ef ` ndx), dom({ <(Base ` ndx), c0 >, < c4, c2 > })= {(Base ` ndx), c4 })
  dmpropg(c0, c1, c2, c3, (Base ` ndx), c4)
  ndmfv((.ef ` ndx), c5)
}

blocks.name: structgrssvtxlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ structgrssvtx and ~ structgrssiedg . (Contributed by AV, 14-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm structgrssvtxlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstr, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c2), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c4)), c0))
} = {
  hashdmpropge2(c0, cfv(cbs, cnx), universe, cfv(cedgf, cnx), universe, c2, c3, c4, c5, universe, w0)
  fvexd(cbs, cnx, w0)
  fvexd(cedgf, cnx, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cstr, c1))
  structex(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, wne(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cedgf, cnx)))
  slotsbaseefdif()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm structgrssvtxlem(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0[Struct]c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → { <(Base ` ndx), c2 >, <(.ef ` ndx), c4 > } ⊆ c0)
} = {
  hashdmpropge2(c0, (Base ` ndx), universe, (.ef ` ndx), universe, c2, c3, c4, c5, universe, w0)
  fvexd(cbs, cnx, w0)
  fvexd(cedgf, cnx, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Struct]c1)
  structex(c0, c1)
  a1i(w0, (Base ` ndx)≠(.ef ` ndx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
}

blocks.content: The set of vertices of a graph represented as an extensible structure with vertices as base set and indexed edges. (Contributed by AV, 14-Oct-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 12-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:

  a1ii((w0 →[c0 / s0]w1), (w0 → c2 ∈ c4))
  a1ii((w0 →[c0 / s0]w1), d(s0, w0))
  syl3c(w0, [c0 / s0]w1, c0 ∈ c5, ∀(s0,(((Vtx ` s0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` s0)= c2)→ w1)), ((Vtx ` c0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` c0)= c2))
  jca(w0, (Vtx ` c0)= c1, (iEdg ` c0)= c2)
  eqtrd((Vtx ` c0), c1, (Base ` c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (Vtx ` c0)=(Base ` c0), Fun((c0 \ { ∅ })), 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  funvtxdmge2val(c0)
  eqtrd((iEdg ` c0), c2, (.ef ` c0), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (iEdg ` c0)=(.ef ` c0), Fun((c0 \ { ∅ })), 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  funiedgdmge2val(c0)
  spcgf(s0, c0, c5, (((Vtx ` s0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` s0)= c2)→ w1), (((Vtx ` c0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` c0)= c2)→[c0 / s0]w1))
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfim(s0, ((Vtx ` c0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` c0)= c2), [c0 / s0]w1)
  nfv(s0, ((Vtx ` c0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` c0)= c2))
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w1)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, ((Vtx ` s0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` s0)= c2), w1, ((Vtx ` c0)= c1 ∧(iEdg ` c0)= c2), [c0 / s0]w1)
  anbi12d(s0 = c0, (Vtx ` s0)= c1, (iEdg ` s0)= c2, (Vtx ` c0)= c1, (iEdg ` c0)= c2)
  fveqeq2(s0, c0, cvtx, c1)
  fveqeq2(s0, c0, ciedg, c2)
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (Vtx ` c0)= c1, (iEdg ` c0)= c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (Vtx ` c0), c1)

}

blocks.name: gropeld
blocks.content: If any representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` is an element of an arbitrary class ` C ` , then the ordered pair ` <. V , E >. ` of the set of vertices and the set of edges (which is such a representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` ) is an element of this class ` C ` . (Contributed by AV, 11-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm gropeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), c0), wceq(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wsbc(s0, cop(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  gropd(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sbcel1v(s0, cop(c0, c1), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gropeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → < c0, c1 > ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0,(((Vtx ` s0)= c0 ∧(iEdg ` s0)= c1)→ s0 ∈ c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, < c0, c1 > ∈ c2, [< c0, c1 > / s0]s0 ∈ c2)
  gropd(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, w0, s0 ∈ c2)
  sbcel1v(s0, < c0, c1 >, c2)
}

blocks.name: grstructeld
blocks.content: If any representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` is an element of an arbitrary class ` C ` , then any structure with base set ` V ` and value ` E ` in the slot for edge functions (which is such a representation of a graph with vertices ` V ` and edges ` E ` ) is an element of this class ` C ` . (Contributed by AV, 12-Oct-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jun-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm grstructeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wa(wceq(cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(cdif(c0, csn(emptycls))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cdm(c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cedgf, c0), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)))
  grstructd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  sbcel1v(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grstructeld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0,(((Vtx ` s0)= c2 ∧(iEdg ` s0)= c3)→ s0 ∈ c1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun((c0 \ { ∅ })))
  ⊣ (w0 → 2[≤](# ` dom(c0)))
  ⊣ (w0 →(Base ` c0)= c2)
  ⊣ (w0 →(.ef ` c0)= c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylib(w0, c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]s0 ∈ c1)
  grstructd(s0, c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0, s0 ∈ c1)
  sbcel1v(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: setsvtx
blocks.content: The vertices of a structure with a base set and an inserted resp. replaced slot for the edge function. (Contributed by AV, 18-Jan-2020.) (Revised by AV, 16-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm setsvtx(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstr, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cbs, cnx), cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(cvtx, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), cfv(cbs, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2)))), wfun(cdif(co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2)), csn(emptycls))), wss(cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cedgf, cnx)), cdm(co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2)))))
  setsn0fun(c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  syl5eqss(cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cedgf, cnx)), cdm(co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), w0)
  preq2i(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cedgf, cnx), c1)
  eqcomi(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c1)
  basprssdmsets(c1, c0, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  fvexi(c1, cedgf, cnx)
  funvtxval(co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2)))
  setsnid(cbs, c0, c1, c2)
  baseid()
  neeqtrri(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
  slotsbaseefdif()
}

thm setsvtx(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))=(Base ` c0))

} = {

  syl2anc(w0, (Vtx `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))=(Base `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)), Fun(((c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)\ { ∅ })), {(Base ` ndx),(.ef ` ndx)} ⊆ dom((c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >)))
  setsn0fun(c0, c1, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)

  preq2i((Base ` ndx), (.ef ` ndx), c1)
  eqcomi((.ef ` ndx), c1)
  basprssdmsets(c1, c0, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c1, cedgf, cnx)
  funvtxval((c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))

blocks.name: setsiedg
blocks.content: The (indexed) edges of a structure with a base set and an inserted resp. replaced slot for the edge function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jun-2021.) (Revised by AV, 16-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm setsiedg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cstr, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cbs, cnx), cdm(c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), c2, cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2))), cfv(cedgf, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2))), cfv(cedgf, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))), wfun(cdif(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)), csn(emptycls))), wss(cpr(cfv(cbs, cnx), cfv(cedgf, cnx)), cdm(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))))
  setsn0fun(c0, cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  basprssdmsets(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c0, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  fvexd(cedgf, cnx, w0)
  funiedgval(co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2))), cfv(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))))
  fveq2i(ciedg, co(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2)), co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))
  oveq2i(c0, csts, cop(c1, c2), cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2))
  opeq1i(c1, c2, cfv(cedgf, cnx))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cedgf, co(c0, csts, cop(cfv(cedgf, cnx), c2)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, universe), wbr(c0, cstr, c3))
  structex(c0, c3)
  setsid(c0, universe, c2, c4, cedgf)
  edgfid()
}

  ⊢ (w0 →(iEdg `(c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >))= c2)
  ⊣ c1 =(.ef ` ndx)

  syl2anc(w0, (iEdg `(c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >))=(.ef `(c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >)), Fun(((c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >)\ { ∅ })), {(Base ` ndx),(.ef ` ndx)} ⊆ dom((c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >)))
  setsn0fun(c0, (.ef ` ndx), c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)
  basprssdmsets((.ef ` ndx), c0, c2, c3, universe, c4, w0)

  funiedgval((c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >))

  fveq2i(ciedg, (c0[sSet]< c1, c2 >), (c0[sSet]<(.ef ` ndx), c2 >))
